column5: Develop a strong foundation of quantitative, mathematical and computational skills relevant to a career in the financial sector.Finance is a dynamic industry, with innovation in quantitative methods driving fast-growing areas such as FinTech. Advances in machine learning and increased availability of data are allowing organisations to make better decisions and improve their products and services.Implementing these advances requires a new generation of graduates with a range of skills in quantitative, mathematical and data science fields. Skills in data science are increasingly sought after by industry.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
